cells.data:
| Syntax | Description |
| ----------- | ----------- |
| h,j,k,l | move cursor|
| i| insert mode |
|esc |navigate mode|
|:qa!|exit without saving|
|w|move to next word|
|b|move to the beginning of the word|
|e|move to the end of the word|
|30i-|write - 30 times|
|:w|save|
|:q|quit|
|u|undo|
